TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextureView extends Android.Views.View

Docs.summary: A TextureView can be used to display a content stream, such as that coming from a camera preview, a video, or an OpenGL scene.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

The attributes of the XML tag that is inflating the view.
An attribute in the current theme that contains a reference to a style resource that supplies default values for the view. Can be 0 to not look for defaults.
A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the view, used only if defStyleAttr is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults.
Docs.summary: Creates a new TextureView.

Docs.summary: Returns a android.graphics.Bitmap representation of the content of the associated surface texture.
Docs.value: A valid Bitmap.Config#ARGB_8888 bitmap, or null if the surface texture is not available or the width <= 0 or the height <= 0

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The Canvas to which the View is rendered.
Docs.summary: Subclasses of TextureView cannot do their own rendering with the Canvas object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetBitmap(class Android.Graphics.Bitmap bitmap) cil managed
abstract member GetBitmap : Android.Graphics.Bitmap -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap override this.GetBitmap : Android.Graphics.Bitmap -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap

Docs.param: The bitmap to copy the content of the surface texture into, cannot be null, all configurations are supported
Docs.summary: Copies the content of this view's surface texture into the specified bitmap.
Docs.returns: The bitmap specified as a parameter

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the hardware rendering context cannot be acquired to capture the bitmap

Docs.param: The width of the bitmap to create
The height of the bitmap to create
Docs.summary: Returns a android.graphics.Bitmap representation of the content of the associated surface texture.
Docs.returns: A valid Bitmap.Config#ARGB_8888 bitmap, or null if the surface texture is not available or width is <= 0 or height is <= 0

Docs.summary: Returns the transform associated with this texture view.
Docs.returns: The specified matrix if not null or a new Matrix instance otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Canvas LockCanvas() cil managed
abstract member LockCanvas : unit -> Android.Graphics.Canvas override this.LockCanvas : unit -> Android.Graphics.Canvas

Docs.summary: Start editing the pixels in the surface.
Docs.returns: A Canvas used to draw into the surface, or null if the surface cannot be locked for drawing (see #isAvailable()).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Graphics.Canvas LockCanvas(class Android.Graphics.Rect dirty) cil managed
abstract member LockCanvas : Android.Graphics.Rect -> Android.Graphics.Canvas override this.LockCanvas : Android.Graphics.Rect -> Android.Graphics.Canvas

Docs.param: Area of the surface that will be modified. If null the area of the entire surface is used.
Docs.summary: Just like #lockCanvas() but allows specification of a dirty rectangle.
Docs.returns: A Canvas used to draw into the surface, or null if the surface cannot be locked for drawing (see #isAvailable()).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
